# Canadian Air and Precipitation Monitoring Network Tender Announcement

## Notice Details
* Title: Canadian Air and Precipitation Monitoring Network – Frelighsburg, QC
* Reference Number: CB-67-16670351
* Solicitation Number: 5000077334
* Publication Date: January 30, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: February 14, 2024, at 3:00 PM EST
* Amendment Number: 3


## Contract Details
* Expected Contract Start Date: March 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: December 31, 2024
* Period of Performance: 12 months, with option for 2 x 1-year renewal periods


## Tender Description
Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) is seeking a Contract Operator to provide daily technical support for the Canadian Air and Precipitation Monitoring Program (CAPMoN) at the Frelighsburg site, located in Frelighsburg, QC. The Contract Operator will be responsible for collecting precipitation and/or air samples at the site, using automated and manual samplers, and processing the samples according to the CAPMoN Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs). The Contract Operator will also perform daily duties such as reading and recording various gauges, conducting diagnostics, servicing, and repairing monitoring equipment.

## Contract Requirements
* Daily technical support for the CAPMoN site
* Sample collection and processing
* Gauges reading and recording
* Diagnostics and servicing
* Minor repair of monitoring equipment

## Evaluation Criteria
* Lowest Price

## Contact Information
* Name: Angelina Garcia
* Email: angelina.garcia@ec.gc.ca
* Phone: 778-726-1680
* Address: #101 – 401 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, V6C 3R2, Canada


## Tender Documents
A Request for Proposal document is available on the Canada Buys website at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30805/5000077334-rfp_en-canadabuys.pdf (English) and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30805/5000077334-rfp_fr-canadabuys.pdf (French). Please note that the tender closing date is February 14, 2024. Late submissions will not be accepted. Please direct any inquiries to Angelina Garcia
